title: Favorite adc
body: what is your favorite adc at the moment

replies.body: yea sorry it only allows me to have 10 spots

Favourite was first lucian
but his ranged got changed, i didn't like it .

So i stopped playing him and sticked to graves ever since, before he was buffed and considered top-tier.

{{champion:104}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:104}}
You have %%%% Fortune in there but not even my boy Kog or Urgot the lad.

I really like lucian becuase he has great poke, burst and some form of escape with his e.
Lucians q is really op and does massive damge.
